user.title: Uber Ride Tracker Setup
user.description:
To set up Uber Ride Tracker, you'll need:

1. Go to developer.uber.com and sign in
2. Create an app or select existing one
3. Find your Application ID and Secret in the dashboard
4. Add this redirect URI to your app:
   {redirect_uri}
